General.Name: Gfl Environmental Holdings Inc
General.Description: GFL Environmental Inc. offers non-hazardous solid waste management and environmental services in Canada and the United States. It offers solid waste management, liquid waste management, and soil remediation services, including collection, transportation, transfer, recycling, and disposal services for municipal, residential, and commercial, and industrial customers. GFL Environmental Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vaughan, Canada.
General.Address: 100 New Park Place, Vaughan, ON, Canada, L4K 0H9
